name: Destroyed Drawings - Death Dances Closer
description:
A series of images of drawings where the original object is destroyed, inaccessible, ruined, or missing. The photo or scan is the only trace.

This pdf 'zine' is showing a drawing I destroyed on purpose. I was trying to imagine the face of Death, as a young girl dancing toward you. This proved to be too challenging. I was obsessed with it though, In addition to this drawing, I also made several paintings and studies on the subject. It remains a powerful thought that will probably come back in my work in some shape or form.

I drew this in pastel and the pdf contains serveral phases of the face as it morphed over time.
